qas.question: What's the title of the comedy movie Schwarzenegger starred in with Danny DeVito in 1988?
How much did Schwarzenegger make from the film Total Recall, on top of 15% of gross?
What 1992 TV movie did Schwarzenegger direct?
An episode of what well-known TV series was Schwarzenegger's directorial debut?

context: <a0_0>Twins<a0_0/> (1988), a comedy with Danny DeVito, also proved successful. Total Recall (1990) netted Schwarzenegger <a1_0>$10 million<a1_0/> and 15% of the film's gross. A science fiction script, the film was based on the Philip K. Dick short story "We Can Remember It for You Wholesale". Kindergarten Cop (1990) reunited him with director Ivan Reitman, who directed him in Twins. Schwarzenegger had a brief foray into directing, first with a 1990 episode of the TV series <a3_0>Tales from the Crypt<a3_0/>, entitled "The Switch", and then with the 1992 telemovie <a2_0>Christmas in Connecticut<a2_0/>. He has not directed since.
